Translations.Text: (Yaa nyini Annabi)! Yεlima! Achiika! Mani nyɛla saɣisigulana. Yaha! Duuma jεmdigu n-kani ni yεlimaŋli naɣila Naawuni, O nyɛla zaɣiyini, Nyɛŋda
“Sagbana mini tiŋgbani, n-ti pahi din be di sunsuuni Duuma, Ŋuna n-nyɛ Nyɛŋda, Chεmpaŋlana
(Yaa nyini Annabi)! Yεlima: “Di (Alkur’aani) nyɛla lahibali din bara.”
Yinim’ (Larbunim’) mi nyɛla ban lebi biri ka chɛ li
N-di ka baŋsim shεli n-zaŋ chaŋ Malaaikanim’ sani saha shɛli bɛ ni daa ŋmεri namgbankpeeni la
Bɛ bi siɣsiri wahayi n-tiri ma na m-pahila n-nyɛla saɣisigulana n-tin ya polo ni
(Yaa nyini Annabi)! Teemi saha shεli a Duuma (Naawuni) ni daa yεli Malaaikanima: “Achiika! N (Mani Naawuni) nyɛla Ŋun yɛn nam ninsala ni yεɣari.”
“Dinzuɣu, N-yi ti nam o naai, ka pɔbsi N nyɛvuli niŋ o ni, yi (Malaaika- nim’) man lum ya, ka nyɛla ban niŋdi suzuuda n-tiri o.”
Ka Malaaikanim’ zaasa lu n-niŋ suzuuda n-ti o namgbaniyini
Naɣila Ibliisa (shintaŋ) n-daa tibgi o maŋa, ka pahi gutulunim’ puuni
Ka O (Naawuni) yεli: “Yaa nyini Ibliisa (shintaŋ)! Bo n-leei mɔŋ a ni a lu suzuuda ti N-ni nam ni N (Mani Naawuni) nuhi ayi? Di ni bɔŋɔ, a tibgila a maŋa, bee a bela ban duhiri bɛ maŋ’ zuɣusaa puuni
Ka o (shintaŋ) yεli: “Mani n-gari o, A nam ma mi ni buɣum, ka nam o ni yεɣiri.”
Ka O (Naawuni) yεli: “Tɔ! Yim di (Alizanda maa) puuni, achiika! A nyɛla bɛ ni kari so yihi N nambɔzɔhigu ni.”
“Yaha! Achiika! N narimbu be a zuɣu n-zaŋ hali ni Sanyoodali.”
Ka o (shintaŋ) yεli: “Yaa n Duuma (Naawuni)! Naɣisim ma hali ni dabsi’ shεli Chiyaama ni yɛn ti yiɣisi.”
Ka O (Naawuni) yεli: “Achiika! A be bɛ ni yɛn naɣisi shɛba ni.”
“N-zaŋ chaŋ sahamirili dali.”
Ka o (shintaŋ) yεli: “M-po A nam nyɛŋsim, achiika! N-nyɛla ŋun yɛn birgi ba namgbaniyini.”
“Naɣila bɛ puuni ban nyɛ A dabgahinda.”
Ka O (Naawuni) yεli: “Di nyɛla yεlimaŋli, yεlimaŋli mi ka n-yɛra.”
Achiika! N (Mani Naawuni) nyɛla Ŋun yɛn chɛ ka ʒahannama (buɣum) pali ni nyini (shintaŋ), n-ti pahi ban doli a bɛ (ninsalinim’) puuni namgbaniyini. “M-bi bɔhiri ya sanyo’ shεli n-zaŋ chaŋ
(Yaa nyini Annabi)! Yεlima: di (Alkur’aani wumbu) zuɣu. M mi ka ban ŋmari ʒiri puuni.”
“Di (Alkur’aani maa) pala shεli m- pahila teebu n-zaŋ ti binnamda.”
